svg.text: politics
The world is full of good people. Earnest and sincere.
Social and altruistic. Trustworthy.
However our politics reflects the moral apathy of cynicism
and moral insanity of nihilism responsible for our present
situation in the moral inversion of government from the
public good to the public bad, from public service to
public exploitation, from survival, subsistence, and
sustenance to deprivation, depredation, and destruction.
We failed to recognize actuality, and industriously
pursued the failure in the elaboration of reality with the
pareidolia of egomania. We have squandered sovereignty to
slavery such that we again confront the election of the
representation of the very inanity of insanity that
threatens the rule of law, the freedom of egalitarianism,
and the security of proletarianism by the degradation,
distraction, deflection, deprivation, depredation, and
destruction that relates addiction to carelessness and
recklessness.
References
https://www.google.com/books/edition/The_Bill_of_Obligations/WUN_EAAAQBAJ
https://www.pbs.org/show/a-citizens-guide-to-preserving-democracy/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LbezUZQYuVQ
https://www.pbs.org/video/a-citizens-guide-to-preserving-democracy-teaser-trailer-tnfm/
